sentences.english: Who says breakfast has to be boring?
sentences.chinese: 谁说早餐一定是乏味无趣的呢？

sentences.english: Police say Chin appeared fine when guards brought breakfast to his cell.
sentences.chinese: 警方称陈在狱卒给他送早餐的时候看上去一切正常。

sentences.english: He had his habitual breakfast, hamburger and ham sandwich every morning.
sentences.chinese: 他每天早上都是惯常的早餐，汉堡包和火腿三明治。

sentences.english: After breakfast he plays his guitar, then he goes to work.
sentences.chinese: 当他吃完早餐后会弹吉他，然后去工作。

sentences.english: Run out of breakfast, I logged an innovative composition network, began to publish the article.
sentences.chinese: 用完早餐，我又登录了创新作文网，开始发表文章。

sentences.english: How about read Breakfast at Tiffanys at lunchtime?
sentences.chinese: 午餐时间读《蒂凡尼的早餐》也不错嘛。

sentences.english: My girls, will you give them your breakfast as a Christmas present?
sentences.chinese: 姑娘们，你们愿意把早餐送给他们做圣诞礼物吗？

sentences.english: The three children ran to the bananas tree for breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 这三个孩子跑到香蕉树旁，把香蕉作为早餐。

sentences.english: It fights obesity, diabetes, and heart disease all day.
sentences.chinese: 早餐整天都与肥胖症，糖尿病，心脏病做斗争。

sentences.english: Upon arrival you will have the local kampong style breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 抵达后，体验富有当地部落风俗的早餐。

sentences.english: He appeared at the breakfast bleary-eyed and with a hangover.
sentences.chinese: 他吃早餐时两眼模糊，宿醉未醒。

sentences.english: When you eat breakfast together, how does it go?
sentences.chinese: 当你们一起吃早餐的时候，情况怎么样？

sentences.english: Do you have breakfast coupon / ticket?
sentences.chinese: 请问您是否有早餐券吗？

sentences.english: We were well primed for the journey with a large breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 为了去旅行，我们早餐都吃得饱饱的。

sentences.english: You might gain weight for not having breakfast. What did you have for breakfast today?
sentences.chinese: 不吃早餐会变胖的，今天早餐你吃了什么呢？

sentences.english: You might gain weight for not having breakfast. What did you have for breakfast today?
sentences.chinese: 不吃早餐会变胖的，今天早餐你吃了什么呢？
